title: Ripeness scorer: calculate beat readiness for action
description: Implement pkg/ripeness scoring 0.0-1.0 based on: age factor (0.2), revisit factor (0.25), connection factor (0.25), action language detection (0.2), completeness (0.1). Tiers: Fresh <0.3, Maturing 0.3-0.6, Ripe 0.6-0.8, Overripe >0.8.

title: Migration script: v0.1 to v0.2 first-run data enrichment
description: On first v0.2 run: create cache, auto-classify all beats, extract entities, calculate ripeness scores, check Ollama availability. Store in .beats/btv-cache.json. Include progress indicator for large beat sets.

title: Extended data model: Taxonomy, Entity, Cluster, Chain, Cache types
description: Add pkg/model types for v0.2: Taxonomy (Channel + Source enums), Entity (with EntityType), Cluster, Chain, Cache structure, ViewStat. These are computed fields stored in cache, not source JSONL.

title: Add README.md with install/usage instructions
Taxonomy classifier: auto-classify beats by Channel and Source
description: Implement pkg/taxonomy with pattern-based classification. Detect Channel (coaching/research/discovery/development/reflection/reference/milestone) and Source (conversation/web/twitter/github/book/session/internal) from impetus label and content. Goal: 0% Manual entry after classification.

title: Cache persistence layer
description: Implement .beats/btv-cache.json read/write. Include version tracking, source hash for invalidation, and atomic writes. Cache stores taxonomies, entities, ripeness scores, clusters, chains, and view stats.

title: Robot commands: taxonomy, ripeness, entities
description: Add robot commands: --robot-taxonomy-stats, --robot-set-taxonomy, --robot-ripeness, --robot-ripe, --robot-entities, --robot-entity-beats. JSON input/output for AI agent integration.

title: Ollama integration for embeddings
description: Implement pkg/cluster/ollama.go wrapper. Check availability gracefully. Use nomic-embed-text model. Cache embeddings by beat ID. Graceful degradation: skip clustering if Ollama unavailable, show message suggesting install.

title: robot-help: JSON schema of robot commands
CLI entry point with robot flags in cmd/btv/main.go
Project picker and cycling (p/P keys)
Loader: discover projects and load beats.jsonl in pkg/loader/loader.go
Lipgloss styles and theming in pkg/ui/styles.go
Add MIT LICENSE file
robot-list: JSON output of beats with project filter
Cache rebuild command and invalidation logic
description: Implement --rebuild-cache flag. Auto-invalidate when beats.jsonl hash changes or cache version mismatches binary. Show rebuild progress for large datasets.

title: Help overlay with keybindings
View stats tracking: record beat views for ripeness calculation
description: Track ViewCount and LastViewedAt for each beat viewed in btv. Store in cache. Update ripeness scores on cache rebuild. Used for revisit factor in ripeness scoring.

title: Quick capture mode: minimal UI for rapid beat entry
description: Implement btv --capture mode. Single text field with channel/source dropdowns. Keyboard-first: type, tab, enter. Auto-impetus detection. Support piped input. Exit after save.

title: Responsive layout system with breakpoints
description: Implement responsive breakpoints: Compact(<60), Normal(100), Wide(140), UltraWide(180). Show/hide sidebars based on width. Ensure all views work at minimum 60 cols.

title: Theme clustering engine with k-means
description: Implement pkg/cluster with k-means clustering on embeddings. Auto-generate cluster names from keywords. Calculate cluster ripeness (aggregate of member beats). Store clusters in cache. Default k=8, configurable.

title: UI: Faceted navigation sidebar for Channel and Source filtering
description: Add toggleable left sidebar showing Channel and Source facets with counts. Click to filter. Keys: f toggle, 1-7 quick channel filter, ! clear. Responsive: hide on narrow terminals.

title: Entity extractor: auto-extract people, tools, concepts from beats
description: Implement pkg/entity extraction using pattern matching and known dictionaries. Extract EntityPerson, EntityTool, EntityConcept, EntityProject, EntityOrganization. Build entity index mapping entity name to beat IDs.

title: Split view layout with adaptive width thresholds
robot-show: JSON single beat detail
UI: Timeline view with density visualization
description: Implement timeline view showing beats over time. Dot density indicates activity. Support zoom levels (day/week/month/quarter). Keys: t toggle, arrows navigate, z zoom, c channel coloring, Enter select date. Show gaps in activity.

title: Action: convert beat to bead (b key)
description: Implement b key to convert selected beat to bead. Shell out to bd create with beat content as description. Pre-fill title from first line or generate. Support converting entire cluster to epic.

title: Stale beat detection and review mode
description: Detect stale beats: >30 days old, never/not-recently viewed, no linked beads, not in chain. Review mode with batch actions: keep/archive/convert/chain/delete. Keys: S enter review, k/a/b/c/d actions.

title: Beat chains: explicit beat sequences for thinking threads
description: Implement pkg/chain CRUD. Chain has name, ordered beat IDs, aggregate ripeness. Keys: c add to chain, x remove, [ ] navigate within chain. Show chain membership in detail view.

title: Search input component with real-time filtering
Robot commands: timeline, clusters, chains
description: Add robot commands: --robot-timeline, --robot-gaps, --robot-cluster, --robot-clusters, --robot-similar, --robot-chains, --robot-create-chain, --robot-chain-add. JSON I/O.

title: Clipboard yank for beat ID and content (y/Y keys)
Add GitHub CI workflow
Updated help system with all v0.2 keybindings
description: Rewrite help overlay to document all v0.2 keybindings organized by category: Global, Navigation, Views, Filtering, Actions. Include brief feature explanations.

title: Robot command: --robot-stale for maintenance automation
description: Add --robot-stale to list beats needing attention. Include staleness reason and suggested action. Used by agents for automated beat hygiene.

title: UI: Entity sidebar with navigation by entity
description: Add toggleable entity sidebar showing People/Tools/Concepts with beat counts. Click entity to filter. Keys: e toggle, E entity search. Group by EntityType with collapsible sections.

title: Fix go.mod module path for go install compatibility
Beat list component with bubbles/list in pkg/ui/list.go
Fix default root path - use ~/.beats or cwd instead of ~/werk
Beat detail viewport in pkg/ui/detail.go
Core types: Beat and Project structs in pkg/model/types.go
Document relationship to beats in README
Remove personal names from entity dictionary
Add install.sh script
robot-search: JSON search results
TUI model: bubbletea model with focus states in pkg/ui/model.go
UI: Ripeness indicators and sort-by-ripeness
description: Show ripeness emoji (fresh/maturing/ripe/overripe) in list view. Add R key to sort by ripeness descending. Show ripeness score and tier in detail view. Top ripest beats should surface actionable items.

title: UI: Cluster view with expandable theme groups
description: Implement cluster view showing themed groups. Collapsible clusters with preview beats. Show cluster ripeness. Keys: C toggle, Enter expand/collapse, n rename, m merge clusters, b create bead from cluster.
